title: How to Import a Vector Image Into Scratch

steps.headline: Open a sprite, costume, or background editor.
steps.description: To open, click on a background or sprite then click on the middle tab of the editor.

steps.headline: Open the importer.
steps.description: Click on the "file" button or Import in the top right-hand corner.

steps.headline: Locate and select the Vector file in the importer.
steps.description: The file should have the extension .SVG.

steps.headline: Edit your image.
steps.description: You can now edit and use your vector image in your Scratch project.

text: Open a sprite, costume, or background editor. To open, click on a background or sprite then click on the middle tab of the editor. Open the importer. Click on the "file" button or Import in the top right-hand corner. Locate and select the Vector file in the importer. The file should have the extension .SVG. Edit your image. You can now edit and use your vector image in your Scratch project.
